vehicles.description: A dark-colored car is parked on the left side of the street, with another vehicle in the same lane ahead of it, its headlights on, indicating it is either stationary or moving in the same direction as this car.
vehicles.explanation: Parked vehicles may suddenly open doors or start moving, while vehicles ahead may slow down or stop, requiring the driver of this vehicle to remain attentive and ready to respond at any time.

traffic cones.description: Traffic cones placed on the right side might indicate that the area is blocked or restricted.
traffic cones.explanation: These cones require the vehicle to stay in the current lane and not to attempt to move into the restricted area.

other objects.description: On the right side of the road, near the traffic cones, there is an object resembling a trash can.
other objects.explanation: Stationary objects near the road may become obstacles if they enter the roadway; it is recommended to drive carefully.

general_perception.description and explanation:
In the traffic image, there is a dark-colored car parked on the left side of the street. Ahead of this parked car, in the same lane, there is another vehicle with its headlights on, which could be stationary or moving in the same direction. The presence of parked vehicles requires vigilance as they may suddenly open doors or start moving. Additionally, the vehicle ahead could slow down or stop, necessitating readiness to respond from the driver.

On the right side of the road, traffic cones are placed, suggesting that the area is blocked or restricted. These cones signal that the vehicle should maintain its current lane and avoid moving into the restricted area.

Near the traffic cones, there is an object that looks like a trash can on the right side of the road. Such stationary objects could become hazards if they were to enter the roadway, so careful driving is advised in this vicinity.

There are no vulnerable road users, traffic signs, traffic lights, or barriers present in the image.

driving_suggestion: Due to the slippery road conditions, please reduce speed and maintain a safe distance from the vehicle ahead. Pay attention to the potential movements of vehicles parked on the left, ensuring not to make sudden lane changes due to traffic cones and stationary objects on the right. Continue to monitor the road conditions, as visibility is low during nighttime driving.

1.description and explanation: This object is a motor vehicle, recognizable by its distinctive shape, including windows and bodywork typical of personal road transport vehicles. The presence of this vehicle on the side of the road may indicate that it is stopped or parked, and thus the ego car should maintain an adequate distance while passing to avoid any potential movements from this vehicle.

2.description and explanation: This item appears to be a safety feature commonly found on roadways known as a bollard. These are often used to direct traffic, preventing vehicles from entering certain areas, while allowing passage to pedestrians and cyclists. When driving, the ego car should recognize this bollard as a boundary marker that is not to be crossed.

3.description and explanation: A road sign with specific symbols or text that conveys traffic regulations or information to road users. This sign serves as an instruction or warning that may affect the driver's decisions, such as speed adjustments or awareness of specific road conditions or regulations in that area.
